long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 Link Previewer: Instant Webpage Peek | Browse Smarter 🚀

Quick webpage preview tool for efficient browsing. See content before clicking - save time and boost productivity!

Key Features:

Instant Link Preview: Hover + Alt to peek at any webpage 🔍
Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your preview activation key 🔑
Universal: Preview links on news sites, blogs, online shops, and more 🌍
Flexible Viewing: Resize and reposition the preview window 🖥️
Fast & Responsive: Optimized for smooth browsing experience 🔥
Privacy-Centric: No data collection or tracking 🔒
Readout Functionality: Listen to the content of the previewed page 🔊
Customizable Content: Adjust text and main article image size 🎨
Dark Mode: Switch between light and dark themes 🌗

Perfect for: 🔬 Researchers, 🛒 Online Shoppers, 📰 News Readers, and 💼 Professionals

How to Use:

Hover over a link
Press Alt (or your custom key)
View webpage content instantly
🆕 Latest Update (v1.0.9):

🚀 Performance improvements

Upgrade your Chrome browsing! Install Link Previewer and start smart-peeking today. 🚀
